SimpleMap - Class in world
SimpleMap holds a 2d map for SimpleSolids, all the methods for adding and removing objects, as well as code for changing the z-index of a SimpleObject.
SimpleMap(int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class world.SimpleMap
Basic constructor initiates the map with Z-indexes 0-15.
SimpleMap(int, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class world.SimpleMap
Full constructor initiates the map with a chosen number of Z-indexes.
SimpleMapIO - Class in world
Loads objects using SimpleWorldFactory.
SimpleMapIO(String, SimpleWorldFactory) - Constructor for class world.SimpleMapIO
Create a new IO object with the specified path.
SimpleObject - Class in world
A basic square object that holds image, position, and update data to draw a dynamic object on the screen.
SimpleObject() - Constructor for class world.SimpleObject
Default constructor.
SimpleObject(int) - Constructor for class world.SimpleObject
Create a SimpleObject optimized to ignore certain methods.
SimpleObject(Img) - Constructor for class world.SimpleObject
Create a SimpleObject with a sprite.
SimpleObject(Img, int) - Constructor for class world.SimpleObject
Create a SimpleObject optimized to ignore certain methods with a sprite.
SimpleSolid - Class in world
The basic colliding object.
SimpleSolid() - Constructor for class world.SimpleSolid
Create a basic SimpleSolid.
SimpleSolid(boolean) - Constructor for class world.SimpleSolid
Create a SimpleSolid optimized for moving.
SimpleSolid(Img) - Constructor for class world.SimpleSolid
Create a SimpleSolid with an image.
SimpleSolid(Img, boolean) - Constructor for class world.SimpleSolid
Create a SimpleSolid with an image, optimized for moving.
SimpleWorld - Class in world
Holds the camera and interfaces with the projector which controls the frame rate.
SimpleWorld(SimpleMap, ImgCanvas) - Constructor for class world.SimpleWorld
Create a SimpleWorld with the desired width and height.
SimpleWorldFactory - Class in world
Holds SimpleObjects that can be added to a map by generated keys.
SimpleWorldFactory() - Constructor for class world.SimpleWorldFactory
 
SimpleWorldFactory(String) - Constructor for class world.SimpleWorldFactory
Create a SimpleWorldFactory with pre-registered SimpleObjects.
SimpleWorldObject - Class in world
The "global" object for the SimpleWorld that can render ontop of the screen.
SimpleWorldObject() - Constructor for class world.SimpleWorldObject
 
size() - Method in class world.SimpleWorldFactory
Get the number of registered objects.
slideEnd() - Method in interface sprite.ImgListener

sound - package sound
Controls the loading and playing of MIDI and WAV files.
Sound - Interface in sound
The sound interface for playing Midi's or Wav's
SoundUpload - Class in sound
Loads all sound files for a directory.
sprite - package sprite
Contains all the abstractions and interfaces for drawing and representing images.
Sprite - Class in desktopView
The basic image.

start() - Method in class dialog.DialogGraph
Starts the flow of a dialog.
start(boolean) - Method in class world.SimpleWorld
Starts the loop that runs the game and updates the objects.
StaticSimpleObject - Class in world
This empty class cannot be removed once added to a map, which means it cannot be added again.
StaticSimpleObject() - Constructor for class world.StaticSimpleObject
